task_description: Navigate to Perintis Kemerdekaan. Walk straight down the narrow paved alley, passing the 'Babakan Ciamis' sign and a row of green stalls on your left. Continue for about 110 meters until the alley ends at a T-intersection with a wide main road. Turn left onto the main road (Perintis Kemerdekaan) to reach the destination.
